item.title: Shopbop’s Inventory Is, in Fact, Part of Prime Day — Here Are the Top 10 Designer Finds on Amazon
item.description: Anine Bing, Jacquemus, Loeffler Randall and Tory Burch are just a few Hollywood-loved labels with steep price drops, live through tonight.
